question:
The Earth Summit of June 1992 lead to which of the following documents?
  1. Rio Declaration on Environment and Development
  2. Agenda 21
  3. Forest Principles
Select the correct answer from the codes given below
explanation:
United Nations Conference on Environment and Development or the Earth Summit or Rio summit was enforced in June 1992 and resulted in the following declarations:
  • Rio Declaration on Environment and Development
  • Agenda 21
  • Forest Principles
Moreover two legally binding agreements were also signed which are-
  • Convention on Biological Diversity
  • UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
